pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Patchwork CoreCore package of Patchwork - an asynchronous distributed microframework.This library contains some core structures and utils to re-use over all Patchworkpackages.## Requirements* Python 3.7## Contribution notes.. warning:: Remember to run `compile-protoc` script after every change in proto files from `protocol` directory. Make sure that all these changes follow guidelines described in Google Protobuf v3 documentation.## Installation``pip install patchwork-core``## Documentationhttps://patchwork-framework.gitlab.io/core
